title: Buff Sion
body:
Option 1: Buff his hp back to original

Option 2: Make it so sion can move while charging q.

Option 3: Make his hp slightly higher while increasing scaling on hp gain from W. Unlike option 1, sion would have to be skilled to farm the lane for cs and won't have the hp if he is bad.

replies.body: They already mentioned the issue with Sion getting his original HP. He always feels like an unkillable tank no matter how well he does farming.
i wouldnt realy say that sion needs a buff (especialy when you can quite easily take 1/3 of someones hp with ult alone, and outdamage your adc with tank items alone)
Ult is unreliable though. One mobilty move and they can just sidestep the ult charge. Sion also should but not required ult from a distance to get the x2 damage and long knock up
What about maokai, chogath, amumu and malphite if against ad.
